profile.name: Jesse Eldridge
profile.title: Automation & Integration Developer
profile.summary: Software developer specializing in business automation and system integration. I build custom solutions that connect disparate systems, automate repetitive workflows, and provide real-time visibility into business operations.

services.name: Business Automation
services.description: Eliminate repetitive tasks and manual data entry with custom automation solutions.

services.name: System Integration
services.description: Connect your existing tools and platforms into a unified workflow.

services.name: Real-time Dashboards
services.description: Get instant visibility into your business metrics and operations.

services.name: Native App Development
services.description: Build true native mobile apps for iOS and Android with native performance and features.

services.name: Website-to-App Conversion
services.description: Transform your existing website into a native mobile app. Not a webview wrapper - true native UI with automatic content sync.
features: True native UI components, not a webview
Auto-sync: update website, app updates automatically

services.name: AI/ML Solutions
services.description: Leverage machine learning and AI for intelligent automation, document processing, and predictive analytics.

services.name: Data Migration
services.description: Safely migrate from legacy systems to modern platforms without losing data.

projects.title: SyncFlow
projects.description: Automated data sync that eliminated 6 hours of weekly manual CSV exports.
projects.problem: Sales team spent 90 minutes every week manually exporting CSVs from Salesforce and Jira to update a master reporting sheet.
projects.solution: Built an automated sync pipeline that pulls from both APIs, transforms the data, handles conflicts, and updates Google Sheets on a schedule.
results: Real-time sync vs weekly manual updates

projects.title: OrderHub
projects.description: Unified dashboard for Shopify, Amazon, eBay, and Etsy orders.
projects.problem: E-commerce seller manually checked 4 platforms daily for new orders, leading to delayed fulfillment and inventory mismatches.
projects.solution: Created a single dashboard aggregating all orders with unified inventory sync and one-click status updates across platforms.

projects.title: InvoiceBot
projects.description: Photograph receipts, auto-categorize, and sync to QuickBooks.
projects.problem: Small business owner spent 2+ hours weekly manually entering receipts into accounting software.
projects.solution: Email or upload receipts → OCR extracts details → AI categorizes → auto-creates expense entries in QuickBooks.

projects.title: LeadScore
projects.description: Intelligent lead scoring based on engagement signals.
projects.problem: Sales team wasted time on cold leads while hot prospects went stale.
projects.solution: Analyze CRM activity + email engagement + website visits to generate prioritized lead lists with Slack alerts for hot leads.
results: Sales team focused on high-intent prospects

projects.title: StockAlert
projects.description: Real-time stock level monitoring with smart reorder alerts.
projects.problem: Retail chain experienced frequent stockouts and overordering due to manual inventory tracking.
projects.solution: Connected POS systems across locations, monitor levels in real-time, alert on low stock, and suggest reorder quantities based on velocity.

projects.title: ReportGen
projects.description: Pull data from multiple sources, generate beautiful PDF reports, email on schedule.
projects.problem: Operations manager spent every Monday morning pulling data from 5 sources to build a weekly report.
projects.solution: Automated report generation with configurable templates, multiple data source connectors, and scheduled email delivery.

projects.title: FeedbackPulse
projects.description: Aggregate feedback from all sources, analyze sentiment, detect trends.
projects.problem: Customer feedback scattered across Google Reviews, Yelp, surveys, and support tickets with no unified view.
projects.solution: Aggregate all feedback sources, run sentiment analysis, extract keywords, and alert on negative trends.
results: Identified service issue before ratings dropped

projects.title: BookingSync
projects.description: Online booking, automated reminders, no-show reduction.
projects.problem: Service business had 25% no-show rate and spent hours on manual appointment reminders.
projects.solution: Online booking widget with automated SMS/email reminders, no-show tracking, and post-appointment follow-up sequences.

projects.title: DataBridge
projects.description: Migrate data from legacy systems to modern platforms without losing anything.
projects.problem: Business stuck on 15-year-old Access database, unable to move to modern CRM without losing historical data.
projects.solution: Custom migration pipeline with data profiling, field mapping, validation, and incremental sync with rollback capability.

projects.title: WorkflowBot
projects.description: Automate internal processes like PTO requests, expense approvals, onboarding.
projects.problem: Internal processes lived in email chains, requests got lost, no audit trail.
projects.solution: Slack bot handling requests, routing approvals, tracking status, and maintaining audit logs.

projects.title: itsjesse.dev Mobile
projects.description: This portfolio website converted to a true native Flutter app with auto-sync capability.
projects.problem: Businesses want mobile presence but webview wrappers provide poor user experience and can be rejected by app stores.
projects.solution: True native Flutter app that pulls from the same JSON API as the website. Update the website content, app updates automatically.

projects.title: FieldOps
projects.description: Native mobile app for field technicians to manage tasks, track locations, and document work.
projects.problem: Field service teams rely on paper-based systems and phone calls, leading to missed appointments and poor documentation.
projects.solution: React Native app with GPS tracking, task management, photo documentation, and offline support for areas with poor connectivity.
results: Native app for iOS and Android
Real-time task updates and location tracking

projects.title: DocuMind
projects.description: AI-powered document search and question-answering using Retrieval Augmented Generation.
projects.problem: Organizations struggle to find information across hundreds of policy documents, manuals, and knowledge bases.
projects.solution: RAG-powered system that ingests documents, generates semantic embeddings, and answers natural language questions with source citations.

projects.title: SmartClassify
projects.description: Machine learning pipeline for multi-task text classification including category detection and sentiment analysis.
projects.problem: Businesses need to categorize and analyze large volumes of text data but manual review doesn't scale.
projects.solution: ML pipeline that classifies text into categories, analyzes sentiment, and extracts keywords using trained models.
